whoamiDescription: A customisable Discord bot for your community.

commandDescriptions.verify: Verify your membership and redeem the @Member role

commandTitles.commandsDescription:
**Commands Manual**
Below is a complete list of all slash commands separated by category:

eightball.title: $ 8-ball

verify.alreadyVerifiedMessage: You are already verified — no further action needed!

calendar.noEventsMessage:

 Try adjusting your query or please try again later.
